doc.field: S&L ACQUISITION RAISES U.S. 1987 TOLL TO 12

- The Federal Home Loan Bank Board (FHLBB) announced the acquisition of Home Savings and Loan Association in Seattle, Washington, by InterWest Savings Bank of Oak Harbour, Washington. The FHLBB said Home Savings was the 12th troubled savings institution requiring federal action this year. It said Home Savings had assets of 150.6 mln dlrs in assets and InterWest had assets of 342.9 mln dlrs.
